Title: Raise revolutionary vigilance, greatly strengthen the dictatorship of the proletariat
Designer: Preparatory Office for the great meeting to establish the Guangdong Provincial Revolutionary Committee (广东省革命委员会成立大会筹备办公室)
Notes: The small caricatures below represent the "Five Black Categories" (黑五类): landlords (地主), rich farmers (富农), counterrevolutionaries (反革命), bad elements (坏分子) and rightists (右派). Also shown are the "Black Hand" (黑手), a US-Chiang-British-Japanese secret agent, and possibly Liu Shaoqi.
